articles.description: Exclusive: Company denies creation of team to track overhaul is part of effort to secure UK banking licence
articles.content: Britains most valuable fintech company, Revolut, is assembling a team to track whether staff are being approachable and respectful, as it tries to address criticism about an aggressive corporate cult… [+5133 chars]
